en: Make a joyful noise unto Jehovah, all ye lands.
hmr: Ram po pohai, LALPA chawimawiin hlimtakin khêk ro;

en: Serve Jehovah with gladness: Come before his presence with singing.
hmr: Lâwm pumin LALPA rawng bâwl unla, Hlasak pumin a hmaah hung ro.

en: Know ye that Jehovah, he is God: It is he that hath made us, and we are his; We are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.
hmr: LALPA chu Pathien a nih ti hre unla, A mi siemtu chu ama chu a na, ama ta ei nih; A mihai le a ran tlatna hmuna berâmhai chu ei nih.

en: Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, And into his courts with praise: Give thanks unto him, and bless his name.
hmr: Lâwmthu hril pumin a kawtkhâra chun lût unla, Inpâk pumin a biekin inhuonna sûng tuollaia chun lût ro; A kuomah lâwmthu hril unla, a hming chu inpâk ro.

en: For Jehovah is good; his lovingkindness endureth for ever, And his faithfulness unto all generations.
hmr: LALPA chu a ṭha sih a, a zainêmna chu kumkhawtluongin um a ta, A ringumzie chu suon po po chenin um a tih.
